#summary How to learn the features of BulkLoader
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

If you are getting started, the GettingStarted will get you up and running in no time.

All downloads and the svn trunk have the detailed !AsDoc documentation (can also be viewed [http://www.stimuli.com.br:8080/media/projects/bulk-loader/docs/ online] )

A more detailed guide can be found at the goolecode wiki:
  * AvailableOptions : all the options for specifing how BulkLoader should treat those items.
  * Events : lists and explains what events are fired for each item individually or for all items as a group.
  * AcessingLoadedContents : how to fetch and use your assets.
  * ReportingLoadingProgress: explains different methods for displaying loading progress.
  * Types : what content types are available and how to use them. (coming soon)
  * MemoryManagment: how to remove items and free memory (coming soon).
  * Logging: BulkLoader has a flexible and plugabble logging feature.
